website_summaries.verdict: These high-cut briefs offer an attractive style and are made especially for plus sizes.
pros: Combines excellent coverage on the bottom with French-cut leg bands for a fit that's both comfortable and flattering
Plus sizes are ideal for full figures
cons: A few customers who have worn these briefs in the past say the quality has declined

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Jockey for decades and I've seen the decline in quality over the past years. I've loved them up to my last couple orders. I see it's about profit for the company and not quality and comfort of the product for the customer. I will gladly pay more for a brand that gives the customer what they are paying for.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mom

customer_reviews.title: These are super sized. See my photo I uploaded
customer_reviews.text: These are really big. I mean really sized large. I normally wear a 9 or 10 depending on the brand. I have other jockey items in a 10 so I thought i was safe. These are super sized. See my photo I uploaded. The white pair are elance panties I previously ordered in a 10, the black is from this listing. The legs and everything are at least 3 sizes larger. They say 10 on them but I'm feeling like this may be mis-sized or packaged wrong because they are that much bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Soclr

customer_reviews.title: ... and the package of black I bought fit just fine and are the same size
customer_reviews.text: The package of white and the package of black I bought fit just fine and are the same size. But this package of the cream, pink, and beige are too small. They are not the same size. Terrible quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Evans, Wellness Integrity Wisdom

customer_reviews.title: PlUS ARE the SAME as regular..
customer_reviews.text: I FINALLY figured this out..I am certain and I hope this helps. Plus is identical to the others!. A regular typical size 7 is THE same as a PLUS 7. A PLUS 8 IS REGULAR 8. They are WONDERFUL RARE underware i had years ago and found this part rather perpkexing trying to find them again with this " plus" confusion..They are the same as sizes were ..why a plus added who knows. They breathe..keep you dry cool as they are all cotton...they stay in place as so many do not. May i add the high waist french cut are so flattering even over weight. They are so comforatble al day..nite..flattering ...keep you fresh....slimmer...love. ignore the ' plus'
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Marie

customer_reviews.title: Something is different...
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived, it looked different & mentioned something like how it was the same underwear but in a new package. I should have seen a red flag there. These underwear had a different inside imprint than my other jockey, and the tags sewn on the outer waistband looked a little off. These are so uncomfortable. At first I thought I got the wrong size, but it wasn’t that. They didn’t fit well, and the material wears differently. (It doesn’t feel like their 100% cotton underwear!) Then I bought some off the actual website. Those were great. I will be sticking with their website from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Book Bum

customer_reviews.title: At last - great quality high cut cotton panties that fit great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with these Jockey Cotton High Cut panties. They fit great and have quality fabric, not the cheap, thin, high shrinkage fabric that other big name brands have switched too recently. French Cut (high cut thigh) panties are my absolute favorite because they never bind. I do recommend checking the size chart for best fit. I normally wear a size 16 to18 pant and wear a size 8 in these panties, which is 2-3 sizes less than other brands. These Jockey panties are not tight, they have a gracious fit, fabric covered elastic for comfort and don't shrink that much after washing.
customer_reviews.author: J Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Jockey 100% Cotton High Cut Briefs.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. It's hard to find panties that don't chafe around the leg holes. These have the most wrapping around the elastic and they're comfortable all day. And I love that I can get them in all black. Pink panties are great but after a few months they fade & look dingy even if you wash them with like colors. Problem solved with black panties. French cut seems to be the same as high cut briefs. All cotton? Yes please! I bought several more packages, no need to try anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Page 9

customer_reviews.title: Well worth cost
customer_reviews.text: I really was reluctant to purchase these because of the price. However, they did not disapoint. They fit great and as a plus size lady, that is super important. Its so hard to find a high quality panty, that washes up well, and won't roll. I've had it with hanes and fruit of the loom which constantly roll, shrink when washed and dried and roll when walking. These don't and thats why I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chell_Lea

customer_reviews.title: these are not the same material
customer_reviews.text: I have this same exact type that I bought in town. I typed the exact info into amazon search and was so pleased to find the same product . The ones I received from Amazon are like burlap or very low quality scratchy cotton. How can we shop online if the info is not accurate. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L Caillau

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable bunched fabric with rubber elastic ... ouch
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn Jockey French cut panties for years. I bought 6 pair 2/ 3 pk cotton and I can only wear 2 out of the six pair. The crotch area is so tight and bunched up they hurt. I only air dry all my undies and tried stretching the to tight area but it doesn’t stretch. I ended up taking out the seam in the crotch area on one pair and discovered some kind of rubber tape type elastic. I cut that out and sewed the seam back up. We’ll see how that works and how long that lasts. Wish I would have tried to return them. Very disappointed. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: C.D.H.

customer_reviews.title: Jockey women’s underwear
customer_reviews.text: Fruit of the Loom discontinued “my favorite panty” which literally was my favorite panty, and I have searched for years for a replacement. These are officially my new favorite underwear! High waisted but the higher rise thigh cut helps with the granny panty issue. Nice coverage. Nice color options. Very breathable - I HATE microfiber, so I’m thrilled these are cotton. A little pricey, and I wish the waistband was wider (-1 star), but overall I really do love them. I’m about 5’4” and 200#, carrying it all in the belly, and ordered (multiple packs!) size 7.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Possibly Fake
customer_reviews.text: I am not convinced these are authentic Jockey Elance panties. They do not fit like the others I've had in the past and I have worn the same design and size for years. The rear end coverage is lacking and the crotch sort of sags down in a weird way. I also think the fabric is extremely thick for underwear. I will not be buying any more Jockey underwear from Amazon again. I'll go back to the source where I know I am getting an original product.
customer_reviews.author: Katrin

customer_reviews.title: Check each pair carefully
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these underwear, fit, comfort, style and am a long time buyer of this product. However this last order left me feeling cheated. There was a hole in one of the pair and I had not fully checked each and every pair when unpacking, so didn't discover the problem right away. There was a little sticker with a number inside the panties in this package leaving me wondering if they had been returned, repackaged and quality control missed the problem. At this price, having one of three pair defective makes them very costly. Be sure to check each pair carefully when you unpackage. I have received no response from customer care; very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky L. Dinneen

customer_reviews.title: Best underwear on the market
customer_reviews.text: Seriously. I've tried various organic cotton brands, and all kinds of styles, and the Jockeys won (again) in the end. 1) Covered elastic. I can't stress how much nicer it is to wear underwear with the covered elastic. 2) Fit. If you have any kind of figure, namely a behind, this underwear works. A lot of underwear is made as if women don't have butts. Well, some women don't; I do. Soul sisters, this is the underwear for us! 3) Does not ride up. I sometimes do have to pull it if I've been in the car, but otherwise, No. Ride. Up. Ever. Yay! 4) Durability. These panties last a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: Queen S

customer_reviews.title: These are my go-to undies.  Now I've turned my mom onto them
customer_reviews.text: My mom actually got these after my recommendation. I'm really picky about the fit and feel of underwear and this is all I buy. They are super comfortable around the leg and waist, which to me is hard to find. They're soft and SO comfortable! I can't say enough good things about them. The plain colors are more comfortable. Some of the newer prints aren't quite as soft and are only printed on the outside. These are tagless now, which I love so they're even more comfortable than before. The little tag on the front really helps to know if you've got them inside out or not. The elastic lasts quite a long time compared to other underwear too.
customer_reviews.author: TriplePurple

customer_reviews.title: Elance is cut wider in the booty. Yay!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only kind I will wear. They're worth the money. They don't ride up or down for that matter. The Elance is cut wider in the butt. If you have narrow hips you probably just want the regular Jockeys. I hang them to dry because I never want them to wear out because I love them. They didn't shrink when washed. I think the description says Plus Size because they're cut wider. But I ordered my normal size 7 and they're perfect. Underwear sizes are weird because I wear a size 14 jeans.
customer_reviews.author: greatlpn

customer_reviews.title: If you want full coverage;;;;
customer_reviews.text: Well I have always liked to have comfortable everyday underwear. Well I found the perfect ones. Great coverage back and front. I will be buying these continuously. I would recommend these to anyone that want a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia J

customer_reviews.title: The best underwear I’ve ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Best part is no chafing in leg seams or ride up. Love these. Cotton material breathes well. Durable even with lots of washes. Max out at size 11 and late pregnancy belly is pushing the elastic. Wish there was a size 12 to get through third trimester without the roll down. Runs large - makes it work. Cost more than twice cost of pairs of Hanes or fruit of loom when on sale, but so worth it for quality and durability. Flattering cut even for plus size frame.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: My favorite undies!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite cut and style for undies. I've been wearing the Jockey Elance French Cuts for years and have them in many colors. Don't be fooled by the "Plus Size" in the heading, they make them in all the sizes. I'm about 130lbs and wear size 6. Being cotton, they do shrink slightly in the wash if you wash and dry on hot, so I try to make a point of laundering them in the warm ranges.
customer_reviews.author: Patience

customer_reviews.title: Great underwear
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this exact underwear make, model, and size for many years. They are great... though I will say that from time to time I get a pair that's a little loose or a little tight, they are not always consistent. This particular package was a little tight... it's like the fabric is cut right, but the elastic doesn't give as much as it should in the waist. But it's minor, and I will continue to buy these for years to come. It's HARD to find 100% cotton!
customer_reviews.author: dogLover

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice panties!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice! Cost more for sure, but: true high-cut leg openings; fully covered elastic; cut generously enough that the parts that are “supposed” to be covered actually stay covered.... the cotton feels high quality somehow, and the colors are pretty and vibrant. Worth the extra expense! I ordered according to my hip measurement, as stated on the sizing chart, and that resulted in the correct size. The number of the “size” (size 10) is lower than the size I need in other brands (size 12 or 13) so I would recommend using this method.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Jones

customer_reviews.title: finally
customer_reviews.text: For years I've wondered why I couldn't find the old Jockey fit like I used to buy. I thought the style was no longer made. I never knew the name of Elance as being what I was trying to find. I don't think my local store carries them anymore. I read the reviewgs that some thought they were large so I sized down a size. They are so nice.
customer_reviews.author: gabalot

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Comfy, Very High
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely soft and comfortable. Not many currently popular cuts have leg openings that fit a fuller hip/rear without digging in, so I went for the high leg here. The description says they come to the natural waist, and you should believe that, regardless of the model with her naval showing. Under dresses, skirts that you would wear at the waist, and high-waist jeans, they're fine. Expect them to show under anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Three on the Way

customer_reviews.title: I like everything about these.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why the banner says Plus Size, because I ordered and received a regular size 7. I like everything about these, and have worn them for over 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: Long-time Wearer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn Jockey For Her panties since high school ... thirty-five years! I like these far more than the Victoria’s Secret high-cut cotton briefs that diminished in quality over the years. Jockey panties are comfortable cotton and come in pretty patterns and colors. The Elance style have covered waist and leg bands. They’re mostly true to size, but thankfully don’t bag or look like granny panties. Some customers have complained about them being ‘expensive,’ but they really aren’t. Besides, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Jepsen

customer_reviews.title: It’s hard to find cotton underwear
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! The material could be a bit softer but it’s fine. It’s hard to find cotton underwear anymore. I like the high cut legs and waist. They are a bit pricey in my opinion. If the price were less I would buy another package.
customer_reviews.author: D. V. Moye

customer_reviews.title: Seems to run large
customer_reviews.text: I loved the colors. They are made well. They feel nice. I ordered the 10 because lately all the underwear I buy has been too small. But Jockey did not skimp on the fabric so these are Bigger than me. I should have ordered 2 different sizes to look at them first. I'm wondering if I could return the two I didn't wear for a smaller size??? Otherwise I'll find a size 10 friend to give them to.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I used to love Jockey french cut. Not anymore
customer_reviews.text: Ugh! What happened to Jockey's French Cut? I have worn the same size (6) and style for several decades. Now, the sizing and quality is inconsistent. Too large. Flimsy material. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Special K

customer_reviews.title: I have found the perfect briefs for me
customer_reviews.text: I have found the perfect briefs for me. Several cheaper companies (Hanes, Just My Size) used to make these, but recently they have started making them 'hipsters' and their fabrics changed for the worse. The Jockey Elance French Cut are just what I was looking for. I wear size 10 and these definitely go to my waist. The fabric covered elastic is comfortable next to my skin and doesn't chafe or ride up. The fabric is soft and smooth; looks great under slacks or sweats. I have already ordered another package of these!
customer_reviews.author: KSev 83

customer_reviews.title: GREAT UNDIES
customer_reviews.text: You just can't go wrong with Jockey. It's the only brand I'll buy, the only brand I wear. They breathe, the wash very well and just get softer with each washing. They do not shrink even in hot water and drying on high. They last and last forever and I love the coveted waist band and leg openings. Once you try these, you'll be hooked. And the great thing about ordering from Amazon is you can always get your size, unlike the high end dept stores.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sharp

customer_reviews.title: I was extremely disappointed to receive underwear that smelled of talc
customer_reviews.text: Jockey has been a reputable company for many years. I was extremely disappointed to receive underwear that smelled of talc. Not only is the smell overwhelming, it leeches onto other clothes in the wash load. It must be infused into the fabric during manufacture as it takes multiple laundering to remove the smell and hopefully any other trace of talc. Most women in the US know that talc is carcinogenic and will not use it. Not everyone is aware that it is one of the leading causes of ovarian cancer. One must also conclude that the poor factory workers in China are unaware. [Soap box moment ~ is Jockey so greedy that it will endanger people's lives for their profit?]
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Bull

customer_reviews.title: these run LARGE
customer_reviews.text: Got the same style and size as previously, but these are really big, even after washing in hot water. Could have gone down a size easily. Unfortunately, these looked like others I had already, so I had washed them all before discovering the generous fit. too late to return. Other than fit, soft cotton that washes well. Would give five stars for quality. The three stars are for the big change in fit from these same Jockey underwear sold a few years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Snapper

customer_reviews.title: OMG! These are granny panties!
customer_reviews.text: What is up with these Jockeys? I usually get a 7 and thought, for post-quarantine Covid comfort, I'd try an 8. These are GIANT. They must be mismarked or something. I thought maybe it was just because they weren't washed yet and were cotton, but they didn't seem to shrink much at all!. Welp, they will work for sleeping along with a t-shirt. Just beware that they are not going to fit like your typical Jockeys!
customer_reviews.author: jag512

customer_reviews.title: Comfort 👍
customer_reviews.text: Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! In the past, I’ve bought from the other two well-known underwear companies. And each time I received underwear that was smaller than the previous package. Even if I ordered a size LARGER, The underwear would still be SMALLER.... It’s great to have a company that is not trying to cut corners & costs. Yours fits and it’s comfortable! I am grateful!!
customer_reviews.author: N. Peltier

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I surprised myself. I wanted practical panties for every day wear with good high fit and Fr cut legs. At first I thought they looked huge and I might have to return... however after washing I decided to keep as the fit is great. No skimping on material. Very comfortable. Nice color choices. Soft and quality made. These will last so I feel the higher price for this brand is worth the extra cost .
customer_reviews.author: Zama

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, poor elastic
customer_reviews.text: This was disappointing, I made a return. The elastic around the waist was about a 1/4 inch wide and the cotton was flimsy. I went back to the Hanes hi cuts with the regular waist band that Amazon sells on here in a 10 pack. Highlight the image and check the elastic on these.
customer_reviews.author: AussiegirlIngridTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Soft and a bit Thicker than Other Brands
customer_reviews.text: I am always hesitant about buying panties online. I like to feel what I am buying to see how it will feel against my skin. I found Jockey Women's Plus Size to be softer than brands I found at Walmart. They run a bit bigger but not overly. The fit was comfortable. The material feels more durable. I love this brand and will be purchasing more soon.
customer_reviews.author: ThoseBesideUsTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the Elance style of Jockey underwear!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Elance style of Jockey underwear. They fit great are comfortable and wash and dry up wonderfully! I did notice that this particular grouping of panties seemed to fit a little bit larger out of the bag and a mean just a little bit but nowhere near enough to warrant purchasing a smaller size. I always wash them before wearing and given that they are 100% cotton they typically shrink up a little so it balanced out fine! Now they fit perfectly! I've been wearing this style and brand of underwear for years! Love these panties! :-D
customer_reviews.author: Rural Girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice undies
customer_reviews.text: I love the French cut and the size was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These panties are a great quality
customer_reviews.text: I am particular about panties. I want cotton with a comfortable waist band the stands up to many washes. I have found that these Hanes panties are very good quality and a bargain in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: kathowl

customer_reviews.title: As wonderful as I remember!
customer_reviews.text: THESE are the RIGHT style. I had trouble finding them for a few years and switched brands. I LOVE the high cut sides and agree with the reviewer who posted that these make one's legs look longer. The vendor for the ones I purchased is called "now supply." I am ordering more in just black, but they will be from a different vendor. These are listed as style 1485... the waistband and legs are bound with cotton. Nice for someone like me who is sensitive to elastic. There is full bottom coverage. The fit is smooth but not tight on me. I hope I will always be able to find these back in stock!
customer_reviews.author: Tch1

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Jockey underwear, and these continue to be a well made, quality product! Love that they have such a wide variety of colors. Super comfy and soft. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Lange

customer_reviews.title: Fine comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are what I would call granny panties but they are very comfortable and fit well I bought these a few times.- this last time they were damp when I opened the package which is really weird because I’m in the desert it’s dry and more than 100° I don’t understand how that could happen. Give me the heebie-jeebies a little bit
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Jockey Women's French Cut Underwear - Comfort and Value
customer_reviews.text: Jockey Womens French Cut Underwear are soft and comfortable!! This product is 100 Cotton and is a great bargain! This product holds up through many washes and wears!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: These are not original Jockeys
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same material as the jockeys I bought in store. I still have those years later and the stitching is sturdy, material 3 times thicker than these, and they are much softer and more durable. One of the undies tore on the side as I tried to pull them up. These CANNOT be original.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Worst fitting underwear ever
customer_reviews.text: I am perplexed by the fit of these. They are incredibly high waisted and narrow in the butt. You end up covered miles above the hip but with buttcheeks/hips hanging out. These are nightmare 1980s undies.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 8 but these are more like 18.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Mac

customer_reviews.title: Pancake butt beware
customer_reviews.text: After my favorite panties were discontinued I have been searching for the best replacement. This is not it. I have no butt, and I cannot lie. These other brothers can't deny that if a girl walks in with a fluffy post-pregnancy waist and droopy thing in your face, you get disappointed.😞 They are soft and would likely be great if they had a little more stretch or if I had a butt. They come up to just below my belly button, so a little high for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cephas

customer_reviews.title: A plus that it  is all cotton
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is cotton and it holds it's shape after several washings, fits perfectly and is very comfortable. I bought a second package of different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this product from Department Store for years. Never had a problem with the fit. Decided to save a little money and order off Amazon for the first time. I should have continued ordering from the same department store I normally ordered from. The size is off and the material is cheaper. Less stretch and much narrower than the authentic underwear.
customer_reviews.author: eedee

customer_reviews.title: A good quality, comfortable panty
customer_reviews.text: For my body shape, these underwear fit me better than anything. I'm 64 but still don't want to resort to wearing "granny panties". This French cut design looks good and is comfortable. Jockey still makes a nice product. I'll never understand why panties are so pricey but since I don't buy them very often I at least want to get something that's good quality. These fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Philsgirl

customer_reviews.title: Meh ... not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered these panties I thought they were a different style. I love these panties:  The ones here are okay. Not as good as my favorites. I probably could have returned them but I decided to keep them to see if they grow on me. They remind me of granny panties. Sticking with the super soft french cut in the future. Having so many types of panties with so many similar names is bound to be confusing ...
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Feel funny - and not in a good way
customer_reviews.text: They feel "bloomy" like the legs are small and the rest of the panty part is way too big. Like clown underwear.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Barth

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off.
customer_reviews.text: Love these underwear, but since the store I bought them in closed all its stores needed another place to find them. Material is still soft, well made BUT...ordered a size 8 and all three pair are a different size. More like a 7, 8, and 9. Didn't realize the discrepancy until I had washed and dried them. Quality control an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Chlobird

customer_reviews.title: Size down!
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t the sexiest to start with, but I was going for comfort. The fact that they are HUGE makes them even less attractive. I would say definitely size down. I usually wear a 6 in plain old fruit of the loom/Hanes in a hi-cut. These are easily twice the size of them. For reference, I’m 5’3, 125 lbs. Definitely returning so I can’t speak to comfort level.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: The only ones for me.
customer_reviews.text: These are the only underwear I've worn for years. These fit exactly the way I want them too. High in the leg, double cotton in the crotch, sturdy cover elastic at the waist and again at the legs to keep it from riding up. I like these colors as they're pretty and subtle, but I've also purchased the white package, the beige package, the black package, and the mixed black/grey package. I tend to like this one the best, but it doesn't seem to go on sale as often or isn't always available in my size.
customer_reviews.author: StoneHenge

customer_reviews.title: These are huge
customer_reviews.text: Nice cotton underwear....but they are huge compared to the Elance bikini cut. I would have ordered a size 7 had I known there is such a big difference between bikini and French cut.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is way off.  Save time and purchase elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these in my usual size 8. These underwear were way too large. I’m guessing they are more like a size 10 or 11 panty. They are either mislabeled or knock offs. Have never had this experience purchasing this brand in a department store. Disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BlackCat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for a plus size!
customer_reviews.text: I had panties chaffing me in between my legs. It didn't matter what size I order or brand. It was hard to pay $7.00 a piece for these panties but I tried it and it worked!!! They fit perfectly and the chaffing has stopped. I just wish I could get the price down so I'm researching that today.
customer_reviews.author: pab931

customer_reviews.title: No happy
customer_reviews.text: 7 way too small , size 8 way too big! No happy medium
customer_reviews.author: Bitsy's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Oh yes, these are the nicest cotton French cut pants.
customer_reviews.text: These were so nice I immediately ordered 2 more packages. The material was nice thickness, smooth, nice white color I ordered. I have a 47" waist and the size I ordered fit perfect. They are so comfortable I can wear them for day wear and sleep wear. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try these they're worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Jockey fan for a long time. Its a little more expensive than box stores...you can never go wrong with Jockey's
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: runs large
customer_reviews.text: These run a little large. Should have gotten a size smaller. Love the jocky hi-cut. Last ones I bought, the material thinned out around the elastic. The material used is cheaper than it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed....:(
customer_reviews.text: I bought some of these at a local store and then they stopped carrying them....I loved them so I looked for them online and was happy to find them. The description and name is the same but the material is totally different!!! So disappointed....locally purchased ones feel like silk and very lightweight....online ordered ones were heavy cotton.....I did not notice whether it stated a different material but the name and brand were identical...I thought the Elance was a uniform style both local & online....IT IS NOT....and I bought 6 packs online due to my store not carrying these anymore.....what a disappointment....
customer_reviews.author: Ghost's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leery about buying on line. The packaging was a little different so I got nervous. That was unnecessary worrying. They fit perfectly and I love them because they are good quality and wear well.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable panties, they don’t ride up and they are breathable. Also they last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Order one size larger
customer_reviews.text: According to the size chart on the package, I should have ordered a size 6 with 39-41” hips (I wear size 10 shorts) but went with a size 7. They shrunk a fair amount after several washings, and after that, size 7 is perfect for me. Not too tight and not too loose. I love the covered waistband and 100% combed cotton. They don’t ride up. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Seem to run a little large
customer_reviews.text: I am a 6 and these were somewhat loose. Not sure if Jockey has changed their sizes recently, but I have purchased size 6 Jockey underwear for quite a while and the others fit perfectly. I love Jockey underwear. The quality is great and it's the only underwear I purchase, but I'm a little disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: maggies mom

customer_reviews.title: Way to big
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Jockey for 20 years. Thought I would give these a try (normally wear Comfies) these are way larger than a size 8. These do go up higher on your waist (covered above my belly button) nit a fan. Immediately asked for a refund and now have to pay shipping back. Will never buy this style again
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Best comfort fit underwear EVER!!!!🤗
customer_reviews.text: Usually the leg holes are way too tight on my other purchased underwear from Stein Mart. These Jockey are all cotton, fit so comfortably, and do not cut in when you sit. I just ordered 3 more packages! Thank you for such a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: So happy I found these!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love, these underware! Will be stocking up on more. I wore the Jockey French cut underware for many yrs and then they changed the cut of the bottom. Made it narrower. I bought a size up but didn’t make a difference. Then I bought the elance and I feel like I got my old style underware back!! Love them. Thankyou
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Noto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect underwear
customer_reviews.text: I have had a hard time with the brand I usually wear. They are cutting them so skimpy that the size I wear is now tight. My sister in law gave me some jockeys she just bought and they were cut true to size. When I needed new underwear I bought these. At first they were a little roomy but now after a couple of washings they fit perfectly. I have no more of the issues I had with my previous brand and they are so very comfortable that this is the brand I will be buying from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly DeSilva

customer_reviews.title: Not as soft as expected
customer_reviews.text: These panties are well made, well stitched, nice cut, and I found them to be not just true to size but maybe even a bit larger than my other brands. I was disappointed as I don't usually "splurge" on Jockey, I often buy brands found in your big box discount store. I did not find them to be soft, and they have not really softened up in the wash either. Disappointing, but I did give them 3 stars as other than this I found them to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite undies!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love,, the fit is fantastic, comfy, great quality, cotton, runs a bit large, i normally wear 7 but in this style i wear 6 and i have 42 hip,, french cut is perfect, great we can still get these here,, i ordered several packages,,
customer_reviews.author: Monkeypony

customer_reviews.title: Quality changed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these underwear many times in the past. I noticed that the quality of the older products made in India (with a size tag sewn inside) is better than the newer ones made in Bangladesh (tag-less). The fabric used in India is thicker and solid. You can clearly tell the difference. If you receive older ones, you are lucky although you need to cut off the size tags before you wear them.
customer_reviews.author: emmy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT AS ALWAYS
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Jockey Plus Size panties for many, many years. Love them and don't use anything else. This review offered star rating for "flattering". Really???!!! No underwear is flattering and is a silly question.
customer_reviews.author: CherokeeSmiles

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves these panties the best out of all her size
customer_reviews.text: She says they fit her well and are comfortable to wear. She loves the colors and the high cut they have. We had a hard time finding size 11 in the stores so we bought here and saved money and got free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Dan Grimes Sr.

customer_reviews.title: What was in the bag was not was was listed on the outside of bag
customer_reviews.text: I specifically ordered the "Elance" because of the material. The outside of the bag says that is what it is, but inside they are just stiff cotton undies - not the Elance I ordered. The tag should say "Elance" but as you can see in the picture, 100% cotton. I will keep because you can always use undies, but will look elsewhere for the correct style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy to find these on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I find the french cut briefs to provide both the comfort and 'coverage' that I'm looking for and I've found Jockey Elance to be the best brand out there. This package replaced some that I've had for about 8 years. The elastic was still like new, but the casing around it finally wore out, exposing the elastic. I swear by them! Especially if you need plus size.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: Way too Large
customer_reviews.text: I've always found Jockey's size 8 to be very consistent, no matter the style or material. However, these run really large; as others mentioned, they're like "granny panties." I chose them online. Big mistake. If I'd taken the time to go to the store, I would have seen the sizing problem. This is the first time I've noticed that Jockey markets size 8 as a "plus size." I can live with that, but not with baggy knickers under my yoga pants! I'm using this underwear as sleepwear, with a long tee shirt.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Tudury

customer_reviews.title: Most comfy underwear ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable! I wear them to sleep in. I have not noticed any shrinkage from multiple washes in hot water and drying on hot temp. This product has held up well. Never noticed any bleeding of dark colors, even with blacks or reds. I have purchased several packs over the years. I wear a size 14-16 pants and the size 9 in this product is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: cabiogal

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP KNOCK OFF
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT Jockey's original quality. Size, seams, fabric quality OFF. The real Jockey's have a sturdy waistband with flat seams. These are more like "made to disintegrate" Victoria Secret crap. I'm just going to buy some inexpensive whatever now, since these aren't worth $7 a piece. My old Jockey's were worth every penny- but not these.
customer_reviews.author: The Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Runs way larger than normal.
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid attention to the review I read that said to buy a smaller size than normal. My normal size in this product is humongous! Received it today - returning it today!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Myklebust

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cotton Underwear - getting hard to find
customer_reviews.text: These underwear are getting hard to find and I have worn them for years. I have to have the covered waistband and they are all cotton. I hope they don't discontinue this product! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Janine Clavadetscher

customer_reviews.title: Comfy as all heck
customer_reviews.text: Comfy with no binding or riding up. Wears very well. Colors don't fade after many washings. No pilling either. Seems a tad expensive at first but well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Questarian

customer_reviews.title: Soft, thicker cotton
customer_reviews.text: Soft cotton. Elastic covered with cotton. The cotton material is softer and thicker than other brands. Holds up well after many washes.
customer_reviews.author: women

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft feel and great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Jockey panties because they have no exposed rough annoying elastic -only nice soft totally encased with the soft jersey knit cotton elastic. No binding or riding with these panties- The "french cut" is questionable- but it could be because I am short- so they fit me more like a brief- Very soft cotton and super comfy- a bit pricey but worth it- no digging, cutting or riding up! So far the beat panty for me-
customer_reviews.author: T. George

customer_reviews.title: I'm too low, these are too high.
customer_reviews.text: They are high waisted. I'm short and fat. Not tall and fat. Too much like my grandma's drawers but I'm betting these are great pms drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Granny drawers
customer_reviews.text: A few years ago I ordered Jockey underwear ,size 8/9 , from Amazon and it or me has gotten a bit snug . So this time I ordered size nine . Well I maybe be an older lady but still like reasonably attractive underwear . These were enormous granny briefs. Jockey underwear is always very well made & quality material but the size was way off. I'll donate them to my local thrift store .
customer_reviews.author: Literary Tigers

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought jockey French cut before . They were silky . These are rough , scratchy cotton and cut differently. I can’t even wear them . The point of under where is to cover the vagina area . These don’t even fully cover that . What a waste of money .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made, comfort waistband
customer_reviews.text: I have had a really hard time getting the sizing right. Tired of sending these back, I need underwear! They are a little small, last order was way too big, but these are so well made with the material covered waistband, only way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M. Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous sizing!!
customer_reviews.text: The size 8 is so large you can pull up the waistband and make a onesie. At least one other reviewer questioned why size 8 is considered a plus size, but the reason is that Jockey thinks it is. These are way too big and baggy. I threw them in the washer and dryer but they don't really shrink. I don't want to fool with sending them back so I'll wear them under work clothes when I clean or mow the lawn. These are too expensive to be so carelessly made. Won't be buying them again!
customer_reviews.author: R. Penn

customer_reviews.title: i was searching for high cut legs.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not easy finding larger sizes with a high cut leg. These are so comfortable, and more comfortable than traditional cut panties. They’re 100% cotton, and the elastic is encased, non binding. I have replaced all of my panties with these.
customer_reviews.author: D Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, soft and good coverage
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. Covers butt cheecks and material is a bit stretchy. Very soft cotton. Nice doubled-over material at all the openings. Does not cut into my skin like another model I tried.
customer_reviews.author: I. Hoogland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I wear 18-20 or 2x-3x in plus size bottoms I ordered a size 10 and the fit perfectly and The quality is great they are super comfortable and soft. Love the cut and waist height over all very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: MIRANDA BODNAR

customer_reviews.title: Just Like Mary Poppins--Practically Perfect in Every Way
customer_reviews.text: I am short. Really short. So these underwear hit at my waist level. But that works for me; in fact it was what I had hoped for. These are comfortable cotton, with covered elastic, that do not restrict or bunch up or feel weird in any delicate places. In fact, they feel pretty much invisible... nothing to draw attention or distract you with awkward fit. The quality appears to be good; I will update later if that is not the case, but so far I am very impressed. I can't imagine wearing any other brand or cut at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Bennetheclone

customer_reviews.title: Jockey Women's Plus Size Elance French Cut 3-Pack, Size 10
customer_reviews.text: These are not consistent with other Jockey panty sizes. I ordered Jockey Women's Underwear Supersoft French Cut - 3 Pack, size 10 and they fit perfectly. These are at least 2-3 sizes too big.
customer_reviews.author: cece

customer_reviews.title: Good basic cotton!
customer_reviews.text: Thick fabric, very well made. Runs, a bit high waisted. Also runs large in size, although I expect they will shrink. Will buy again! Great price vs department store panties. Good basic cotton.
customer_reviews.author: ILoveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Comfy! Great design
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I prefer the all black design, instead of the white band at the waist. Comfy. Wish the seller had the 5-pack available at the time, instead of just the 3-pack. They're great and worth the money. Were also true to size.
customer_reviews.author: LadyJay

customer_reviews.title: I like that they are cotton and the fabric seems good
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are cotton and the fabric seems good. But they are bit on the frumpy side in styling and was hoping for a bit better fit. A smaller size would likely have been to small. To early to tell how well they will hold up but I use cold water and mild detergents so my clothes usually don't wear out very fast anyway.
customer_reviews.author: S. CharmianTop Contributor: Pets

product_meta.title: Jockey Women's Plus Size Elance French Cut 3-Pack
product_meta.description: The Jockey® Plus Size Elance® French Cut women's underwear is made with pure cotton for complete comfort. This higher-cut underwear offers a smoothing look and sits at the natural waist for full-coverage comfort.
feature_bullets: 100% cotton. Machine wash and dry. Imported.
